text:
An owl named Mikoto looks like baked potatoes. ü¶â In general, she‚Äôs great - she rides a bicycle, tries on hats
07 Nov 2019, 10:57 by Meduza
Meet this owl Mikoto, she lives in Japan. Mikoto is an unusual bird. Of course, like all owls, she can fly. But why waste your energy if you can ride a bike? Let the owner pedal!



And no, this is not an isolated case - on Mikoto's blog on Twitter you can find a dozen of these videos. Due to the color of the plumage, the owl is compared to baked potatoes. Although, frankly, the bird is more like white bread with poppy seeds.



By the way, Mikoto also rode a car!



Mikoto seems to be not at all embarrassed by the cameras. On the contrary, poses and smiles while caressing her.



The owner occasionally makes Mikoto hairstyles. Feathers are fixed on her head (and she does!).



She also has a warm pink hat!



Mikoto often hides under a blanket - apparently so comfortable. But in general, she sleeps in a cardboard box.



And so the owl takes a bath.



Mood: look out the window, thinking about the future. A better overview from the owner‚Äôs head!



Bonus Graceful Mikoto enjoys spring




More owls, big and small
